title: New PBM law could open door to direct sales between employers, drugmakers
description: The new PBM law could lead to employers buying directly from drugmakers, just like the administration is encouraging individual consumers to do through TrumpRx.
content: The new PBM law could lead to employers buying directly from drugmakers, just like the administration is encouraging individual consumers to do through TrumpRx.
